page.title: 17RECREATION GOLDSBOROUGH AREA
page.content: In 1985{children}like to play with{toys}that work on electricity. Lots of{children}have{computers.}Most boys like radio controlled cars and cars that go on tracks.Girls play with toys like{Sindy,Barbie}dolls and carebears which are like small{teddy {bears.}Boys have{Action Men}and{lego as well.{Monopoly,Cluedo}and{games like that are family board games.Most boys like{football}and{Cricket}and { {golf}as well.Most girls like{Netball.} Boys and girls play at{Rounders.}In the playground we play{ {Chain-tig,football}and{B.B.D. {B.B.D.}is a game of catch played with the catcher in the middle and runners outside a square.
